answerText: Snell's law[10] Snell's law can be used to define the angle at which the onset of this behavior occurs. That angle is called the critical angle.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 14 - Finals 2 | 1 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This law is commonly derived from Fermat's principle of least time. For 10 points each: [10] Name this law that relates the angle of incidence and the angle of refraction for a ray of light passing from one medium to another. It is commonly stated as n sub one sine of theta sub 1 equals n sub 2 sine theta sub 2.
